Source code for bambu.blog.managers

from django.db.models import Manager


[docs]class PostManager(Manager):

[docs]	def get_query_set(self):
		return self.model.QuerySet(self.model)
	


[docs]	def live(self):
		return self.get_query_set().live()
	


[docs]	def css(self, rendered = False):
		return self.get_query_set().css(rendered)
